price: 87. Wuxuu yidhi: Qofkii dulmi fala (oo naga fallaagooba)20, waa aanu cadaabi (dili), haddana waxaa loo celin xagga Rabbigiis; wuxuuna ku cadaabi cadaab daran.
arabic: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوۡفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا
footnotes: 20. Ku adkeysta shirki, gaalnimo, denbi, iwm oo aan dooneyn inuu hanuuno oo qaato Islaamka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla ammā man ẓalama fasawfa nuʿadhibuhu thumma yuraddu ilā rabbihi fayuʿadhibuhu ʿadhāban nuk'ran
